  • Constructor Details

    • Planet

      public Planet​(double dis, double ang, double diam, java.lang.String c)
      Create a Planet object. Once an instance of this Planet class is created, a stelar object of the given diameter is built, being able to be displayed in the Solar System.
      Parameters:
      dis - the distance from the sun to the object.
      ang - the angle (in degrees) that represents how far the planet is around its orbit of the sun.
      diam - the size of the object.
      c - the colour of this object, as a string. It is always one of the given options from the colour variations from the Solar System class.

    • drawPlanetInto

      public void drawPlanetInto​(double speedRot, SolarSystem milkyWay)
      Method for drawing the Planet object into the specified Solar System. We pass two arguments and make the Planet orbit our sun in the middle.
      Parameters:
      speedRot - the rotation with which the planet will orbit around the sun.
      milkyWay - the Solar System that we want to draw the planet into.
